description:
Bulma plans a victory party for all the fighters and wants to include Monaka. Beerus fears Goku will learn the truth of his newest rival and tries to keep him from going. But when Monaka shows up, they’ll have to figure out a way to keep it all secret!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Haran no Shukushoukai! Tsui ni Taiketsu!? Monaka tai Son Gokuu
The Victory Celebration of Chaos! They Battle at Last?! Monaka vs Son Goku
Tumult bei der Siegesfeier! – Kommt es nun zum Kampf zwischen Goku und Monaka?
波乱の祝勝会! 遂に対決!? モナカVS[たい]孫悟空
